grow_event_type_fire/3901_1301_0100_10:
Let me guess—you want to challenge me?
I’ll be waiting for you.
grow_event_type_fire/3902_1031_0100_10:
You shall witness the
strength of Steel type!
En garde!
grow_event_type_fire/3902_1301_0100_10:
Ho! Well met, young challenger! I see you wish to
test your mettle against the unyielding ice! May
our contest be fair and honorable!
grow_event_type_fire/3903_1031_0100_10:
Y’know what? Hot battles
aren’t that bad.
grow_event_type_fire/3903_1301_0100_10:
You’ve got the look of someone who wants to
battle! Enough rambling. Let’s get this show
on the road!
